entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 09:12 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 09:12 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
